title: Senior Accountant w/m
body:
Senior Accountant

based in Vienna

POSITION SUMMARY

Senior Accountant is responsible for preparation, examination and analysis of accounting records, financial statements and other financial reports, in line with Austrian GAAP
and corporate standards. Senior Accountant serves as a point of contact to Governmental Institutions (Tax Office, Health Insurance etc.) and to other parties for all accounting/tax related issues.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES

  • Responsibility for daily accounting activities of the company
  • Accountability for yearly & monthly accounting closings
  • Establishment and maintenance of the accounting records in accordance with Austrian GAAP/Canadian GAAP.
  • Key role in preparation, analysis, interpretation, and delivery of financial statements.
  • Preparation of tax owed and tax returns, ensuring compliance with tax requirements
  • Point of Contact for Tax Office, Health Social Security, Magistrate
  • Involvement in payroll activities (employment abroad)
  • Provision of necessary accounting information and various analysis to the management
  • Ownership of Time & Expense process
  • Development and implementation of best practices for efficient and effective operation
    of the accounting department and its processes.
  • Other accounting/finance duties according to the needs


SKILLS, QUALIFICATIONS, and COMPETENCIES

  • University Degree in Accounting, Finance
  • 4+ years of progressively responsible experience.
  • CPA, CA or equivalent accounting education (“Buchhalter”, “Bilanzbuchhalter”)
    is an advantage
  • Detailed understanding of Tax Office and reporting requirements
  • Excellent written and oral German and English
  • Hands-on experience with ERP systems (knowledge of ODOO is an advantage)
  • Intermediary knowledge of excel would be beneficial
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and prioritize deadlines on an ongoing basis.


OUR OFFERING

  • Challenging area of responsibility in a fast-growing international company.
  • Excellent working environment.
  • Minimum monthly salary (KV) of Euro 2.871,00 gross; overpayment possible depending on experience and qualification.
